revised_title: The Life and Medical Career of Dr. John Turton
tldr: This article discusses the life and medical career of Dr. John Turton, a well-respected physician in the 18th century. Turton was connected to famous figures such as Dr. Johnson, Edward Gibbon, David Garrick, and Oliver Goldsmith. He served as a physician to several members of the Royal Family and played a small but significant role in the life of Jean-Jacques Rousseau. The article highlights Turton's travels, friendships, and medical experiences during his time.
